name: Smash Therapy
description:
Destroy with ZERO consequence!

These are stressful times to live in. Gas prices are light bills, light bills are rent prices, and rent prices are mortgage prices. Sometimes, you just need a way to escape. Sometimes, you just want to take a baseball bat and smash all of the china in the room. Sadly, doing these things in real life could land you in prison. But, this project rewards you for smashing the following:
  • Plates
  • Cups
  • Shot Glasses
  • Wine Glasses
  • Beer Bottles
  • Televisions
  • Computer Monitors
  • Glass Tables
  • Game Systems
  • Vases
  • & More

This game is a simple experience that randomly generates a room full of items for you to destroy.
